Blitz Ace [S] (2 Water): Until the end of the turn Tidus gains Brave. Tidus can attack as many times as your points of damage this turn.

property.value:

When a Character is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may remove it from the game instead.

property.value: The cost required to cast your Water Summons is reduced by 1 (It cannot become 0).

Brave

property.value: DFF ● VII

property.name: Occupation
property.value: Goddess of Harmony

property.name: Abilities
property.value:
Cosmos can be played onto the field even if you control other Light Characters.
You can play 2 or more Light Characters onto the field.
If Cosmos is on the field, Cosmos can produce CP of any Element.

property.name: Occupation
property.value: God of Chaos

property.name: Abilities
property.value:
Chaos can be played onto the field even if you control other Dark Characters.
You can play 2 or more Dark Characters onto the field.
If Chaos is on the field, Chaos can produce CP of any Element.

property.name: Abilities
property.value: When The Emperor is put from the field into the Break Zone, you may search for 1 [Card Name (The Emperor)] and play it onto the field dull.
